tit.j: 久御山町のってこバス

sen.j: 久御山のってこバス（くみやまのってこバス）は、京都府久世郡久御山町が運営しているコミュニティバスである。
sen.e: Kumiyama Notteko Bus is a community bus which is managed by Kumiyama-cho, Kuse District, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kumiyama Notteko Bus is a community bus which is managed by Kumiyama-cho, Kuse District, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kumiyama Notteko Bus is a community bus which is managed by Kumiyama-cho, Kuse-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: かつては、京阪バス・京阪シティバス・京阪宇治交通・京阪宇治バスが運行していたが、路線の統廃合などにより現在は京阪バスと京阪宇治バスが運行している。
sen.e: Keihan Bus, Keihan City Bus, Keihan Uji Kotsu, and Keihan Uji bus used to run, but at present, because of merger and abolishment of lines, Keihan Bus and Keihan Uji Bus are running.
It was formerly run by Keihan Bus, Keihan City Bus, Keihan Uji Kotsu, and Keihan Uji bus but at present, it is operated by Keihan Bus and Keihan Uji Bus due to mergers and abolishments of lines.
It was formerly run by Keihan Bus, Keihan City Bus, Keihan Uji Kotsu, and Keihan Uji bus but at present, it is operated by Keihan Bus and Keihan Uji Bus due to mergers and abolishments of lines.

sen.j: 京阪バスの公式サイト上で紹介されている東コースの路線名は『久御山実証実験』、京阪宇治バスの公式サイトで紹介されている西ルートの路線名は『久御山コミュニティバス・西巡回線』である。
sen.e: The name of east course line which is introduced on Keihan Bus official website is "Kumiyama Jisshojikken (Kumiyama demonstration experiment)", and the name of west course line which is introduced on Keihan Uji Bus official website is "Kumiyama Community Bus Westbound Line".
sen.cmt: 『久御山コミュニティバス・西巡回線』→”Kumiyama Community Bus Westbound Line”[定訳不明]
sen.e: The name of the east route, is introduced on the Keihan Bus official website as "Kumiyama Jisshojikken (Kumiyama demonstration experiment)", while the name of the west tour is introduced on the Keihan Uji Bus official website as "Kumiyama Community Bus Westbound Line".

The name of the east route, is introduced on the Keihan Bus official website as "Kumiyama Jisshojikken" (Kumiyama demonstration experiment), while the name of the west tour is introduced on the Keihan Uji Bus official website as "Kumiyama Community Bus Westbound Line."
sen.cmt: クォーテーション内のカッコ文を移動、カンマ・ピリオドの位置を移動

sen.j: また、久御山町の公式サイトでは全体を総称して『久御山町巡回バス』と記載されている。
sen.e: Also it is recorded as "Kumiyamacho Junkai Bus" (Kumiyama Town Circuit Bus) which is the generic name on the Kumiyama District official website.
sen.cmt: 『久御山町巡回バス』→”Kumiyamacho Junkai Bus”(Kumiyama Town Circuit Bus)[定訳不明]
sen.e: Also it is recorded as being the "Kumiyamacho Junkai Bus" (Kumiyama Town Circuit Bus) which a generic name listed on the Kumiyama District official website.
Also it is recorded as being the "Kumiyamacho Junkai Bus" (Kumiyama Town Circuit Bus) which a generic name listed on the Kumiyama-cho official website.

sen.j: なお、単に『のってこバス』とも呼ばれている。
sen.e: Also it's called simply "Notteko Bus".
It also known simply as the "Notteko Bus".
It is also known simply as the "Notteko Bus."
sen.cmt: "is"を追加、ピリオドの位置を移動

sen.j: 2004年1月15日 基幹ルート開設（中書島（中書島駅は当時バス停は設置されていない）-久御山団地）
sen.e: January 15, 2004: Opening of the base route (Chushojima Station (at that time, there was no bus-stop at Chushojima Station) - Kumiyama Danchi).
January 15, 2004: Opening of the base route (Chushojima Station (at that time, there was no bus-stop at Chushojima Station) - Kumiyama Danchi).

sen.j: 平成16（2004）年7月2日 基幹路線の試験運行終了（この時に基幹路線は大久保駅 (京都府)に延長されコミュニティバスから一般路線に変更される）。
sen.e: July 2, 2004: The test drive on the base line was finished (At this time, the base line was extended to Okubo Station (Kyoto Prefecture) and renamed from community bus to general line).
July 2, 2004: The test drive for the base line was finished (at this time, the base line was extended to Okubo Station (Kyoto Prefecture) and renamed from community bus to general line).

sen.j: 東ルートと西ルートの試験運行開始。
sen.e: The test drive starts on the east route and the west route.
Test drive starts on the east route and the west route.
Test drive starts on the east route and the west route.

sen.j: 2007年4月1日 コミュニティバス・東ルートの一部経路変更
sen.e: April 1, 2007: A part of the east route of community bus changed.
April 1, 2007: A part of the east route for the community bus is changed.

sen.j: 平成19（2007）年6月22日 利用者数が10万人を突破
sen.e: June 22, 2007: The number of usage people became more than 100,000 people.
June 22, 2007: The number of people using the bus tops 100,000 people.
June 22, 2007: The number of people using the bus tops 100,000 people

sen.j: 運賃は全線・大人150円、小児80円
sen.e: Fare for all line is 1500 yen for adult, 800 yen for child all lines.
Fare for all lines are 1500 yen for adults, 800 yen for children.
Fare for all lines are 1500 yen for adults, 800 yen for children

sen.j: 支払いには京阪グループ共通バスカード及びスルッとKANSAIが使える（京阪バス1dayチケットの利用はもともと適用範囲外のため不可能）。
sen.e: It's able to use Keihan Group common bus card and Surutto Kansai for payment (Keihan Bus 1 Day ticket is unable to use, because it's originally out of limit).
The Keihan Group common bus card and Surutto Kansai can be used for payment (Keihan Bus 1 Day ticket can not be used, as it is typically considered as being out of scope.)
The Keihan Group common bus card and Surutto Kansai can be used for payment (Keihan Bus One Day ticket can not be used, as it is typically considered as being out of scope).

sen.j: ジャスコ久御山店停留所で東ルートと西ルートとの乗り継ぎができる（のりかえ券を販売）。
sen.e: It's able to transfer at the JUSCO kumiyama Stop to East route and West route (transit ticket is sold).
The tickets allow for transfers at the JUSCO kumiyama Stop to East route and West route (transfer tickets are sold here).

sen.j: また、毎月最終日曜日に乗車料金を無料にしている。
sen.e: Also, fare is free on the last Sunday of each month.
Also, fare is free on the last Sunday of each month.

sen.j: 東コース（京阪バス枚方営業所担当）

sen.j: 《1》ジャスコ久御山店→新タマキ→工業団地→佐古→垣内→久御山団地→栄中央公園→林→佐山→下津屋→工業団地→新タマキ→ジャスコ久御山店

«1»JUSCO Kumiyama - Shin Tamaki -Kogyodanchi - Sako- Kakiuchi - Kumiyama Danchi - Sakae Chuokoen (Sakae Central Park) - Hayashi - Sayama - Shimotsuya - Kogyodanchi (Industrial Park) - Shin Tamaki - JUSCO kumiyama
sen.cmt: JUSCO Kumiyama Stop→他の表記と合わせ、JUSCO Kumiyamaのみとしました。Shimotuya→Shimotsuyaに修正、栄中央公園、工業団地の英訳表記を追加

sen.j: 《2》ジャスコ久御山店～新タマキ（※1）～久御山町立久御山中学校～田井荒見～久御山町役場
sen.e: «2»JUSCO Kumiyama Stop - Shin Tamaki (*1) -Kumiyama-choritsu Kumiyama Chugakko - Taiarami -Kumiyama-machiyakuba
«2»JUSCO Kumiyama Stop - Shin Tamaki (*1) -Kumiyama-choritsu Kumiyama Chugakko - Taiarami -Kumiyama-machiyakuba

sen.cmt: ※→*に変更、JUSCO Kumiyamaとし、Kumiyama-machiyakuba→Kumiyamacho-yakubaに修正し英訳を追加、久御山町立久御山中学校の英訳を追加

sen.j: 《1》→《2》のコース順で運行される。

Runs from «1» to «2», in order.
Runs from «1» to «2», in order.

sen.j: 《1》のコースの第1便は佐古始発で第9便は下津屋止め。

The first bus for «1» departs from Sako, and the 9th bus arrives at Shimotsuya.

sen.j: ※1 第1便は経由しない。

sen.j: 市田停留所を発着する便は、それぞれ28B・29B系統の番号が与えられている。

Each bus which departs from Ichida Stop is numbered as 28B/29B routes.
Each bus which departs from Ichida Stop is numbered as 28B/29B routes.

sen.j: 28B系統は朝の1本限り（淀行きの初発便）、29B系統は夜の1本限り（淀発の終発便）である。
sen.e: Route 28B runs only once in the morning (the first bus which goes to Yodo), and Route 29B runs only once at night (the last bus which departs from Yodo).
Route 28B runs only once in the morning (the first bus goes to Yodo), and Route 29B runs only once at night (the last bus departs from Yodo).
Route 28B runs only once in the morning (the first bus goes to Yodo), and Route 29B runs only once at night (the last bus departs from Yodo).

sen.j: 久御山町役場サイドでは、上記のコースを『東巡回ルート』『西巡回ルート』もしくは二つ併せて『東西巡回ルート』と呼んでいる（乗車料金の項目を参照されたし）。

sen.j: KUMIYAMA EXPRESS（当時は京阪バス枚方営業所・京阪バス京田辺営業所・京阪バス洛南営業所・京阪宇治バス宇治営業所との共管）

sen.j: 久御山団地～佐古～新タマキ～ジャスコ久御山店前～ジャスコ東～（西大手筋→）中書島
sen.e: Kumiyana Danchi - Sako - Shin Tamaki- JUSCO Kumiyama Stop - JUSCO higashi - (Nishiotesuji) - Chushojima
Kumiyana Danchi - Sako - Shin Tamaki- JUSCO Kumiyama Stop - JUSCO higashi - (Nishiotesuji) - Chushojima

sen.j: 現在の大久保中書島線25号経路（京阪シティバス洛南営業所・京阪宇治バス宇治/田辺営業所との共管）の原型ではあるが、当時は洛南道路が未完成な部分があったため中書島行きについてはジャスコ東から国道1号線を走り、中書島からは現在と同じ洛南道路を経由していた。
sen.e: It was the original route of number 25 route (shared the management with Kyoto City Bus Rakunan Office and Keihan Uji Basu Uji/ Tanabe Office) of Okubo Chushojima line at present, but the bus which goes to Chushojim ran National Road No. 1 from JUSCO higashi, and it ran same route from Chushojima as now, because some of the part of Rakunan Road was incomplete.

It was the original route for the current number 25 route (which shared management with Kyoto City Bus Rakunan Office and Keihan Uji Basu Uji/ Tanabe Office) of Okubo Chushojima line, but due to a part of the Rakunan Road being incomplete, the bus going to Chushojim ran National Road No. 1 from JUSCO higashi, and ran the same route from Chushojima as it does now.

It was the original route for the current number 25 route (which shared management with Kyoto City Bus Rakunan Office and Keihan Uji Basu Uji/ Tanabe Office) of Okubo Chushojima line, but due to a part of the Rakunan Road being incomplete, the bus going to Chushojim ran National Road No. 1 from JUSCO higashi, and ran the same route from Chushojima as it does now.

sen.j: なお一般路線化と同時に久御山団地～近鉄大久保を延長した他、京阪宇治バス宇治営業所担当分の一部の便はさらに宇治車庫までの系統（23系統）も開設された。
sen.e: And, the same time when it became a regular route, it extended the line of Kumiyama danchi to Kintetsu Okubo, also a part of bus which was managed by Keihan Uji Bus Uji Office was established the route (the route 23) that goes to Uji garage.

When it became a regular route, it extended its line frof Kumiyama danchi to Kintetsu Okubo, also a part of bus which was managed by Keihan Uji Bus Uji Office was established the route (the route 23) that goes to Uji garage.

It uses Hino Liesse which is provided by the Keihan Bus Hirakata Office.

sen.e: The painting is different from other same series of cars which prepared at same office, it's a puzzle pattern which is same as Kurutto Bus.

sen.j: 開設に当たっては京阪バス門真営業所から転属された三菱ふそう・ローザを使用していた（現在その車両は京阪バス寝屋川営業所に再転属されタウンくるに使用されている）。
sen.e: When it was opened, it used Mitsubishi Fuso Rosa which was transferred from Keihan Bus Kadoma Office (at present, that bus uses for Town-kuru which was retransferred to Keihan Bus Neyagawa Office).

sen.j: なお専用車両には予備車が無いため車検時は枚方営業所の小型車（一般塗装）が代走で使用される。
sen.e: Also, the exclusive car doesn't have extra car, so when it's in the safety check, the small car (regular painting) is used as substitute.
Also, since there are no extra cars for the specialized cars, small cars (with regular bodywork) are used as a substitute when the regular vehicles are being inspected..

The bodywork features a puzzle pattern and is the same as the car for the East Route, uses a green puzzle design on cream color base.
The bodywork features a puzzle pattern and is the same as the car for the East Route, uses a green puzzle design on cream color base.

sen.j: なお、開設に際しては日野・リエッセレインボーRB・AB系を使用し、その車両は現在も予備車となっている。
sen.e: And it used Hino Rainbow RB/ AB for opening, and these cars became substitutes at present.
For its opening, it used Hino Rainbow RB/ AB, and these cars are now used as backup vehicles.
For its opening, it used Hino Rainbow RB/ AB, and these cars are now used as backup vehicles.

sen.j: 4社ともそれぞれの営業所に配備されている大型車もしくは中型長尺車を使用していた。
sen.e: The 4 companies were using a large-size car or a long middle-size car which was prepared at each office.
The 4 companies used large-sized a long middle-size vehicle which was provided at each office.
The four companies used large-sized a long middle-size vehicle which was provided at each office.

sen.j: 現在の大久保線25号経路/23系統はそれを踏襲している（現在は時折中型車両を使用することがある）。
sen.e: The route 25/ the route 23 of Okubo line at present follows them (it uses middle-size car sometimes at present).
The current route 25/23 of Okubo line follows them (currently it sometimes uses middle-size vehicles).
The current route 25/23 of Okubo line follows them (currently it sometimes uses middle-size vehicles).
